content:
Hi guys, I built the compiler and now I want to start fixing this issue https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/70953
but I don't know new contributes that have low knowledge about the compiler, how should start
can anyone helps me please and tell me which files should I read or where should I start from? is it possible? :sweat_smile:
I mean that I need someone to mentor me if is possible
there's some info in https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/70953#issuecomment-666258785 it looks like
see https://rustc-dev-guide.rust-lang.org/overview.html?highlight=query#queries for more about queries in general
aa right I did not notice that, thanks, I will read it
